description:
This module defines a set of functions to manage integrity constraints that are declared in the prolog of a module. For example, it provides functions to activate or deactivate integrity constraints.

This module is part of Zorba's XQuery Data Definition Facility. All the integrity constraints managed by this module have to be pre-declared in the prolog of a module. Please refer to the general documentation for more information and examples.
authors: <xqdoc:author xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">Nicolae Brinza, Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis</xqdoc:author>

functions.name: activate
functions.description: Activates an integrity constraint in the dynamic context.
functions.summary: Activates an integrity constraint in the dynamic context.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the integrity constraint to activate.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that consists of a upd:activateIntegrityConstraint($name) update primitive.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0031 if the integrity constraint does not exist in the static context.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: activated-integrity-constraints
functions.description: Gets the integrity constraints that are activated, if any.
functions.summary: Gets the integrity constraints that are activated, if any.

returns.description: A sequence of QNames, one for each activated integrity constraint, or an empty sequence if none.

functions.name: deactivate

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the integrity constraint to deactivate.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deactivates the integrity constraint.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0032 if the integrity constraint was not declared in the the static context.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0032 if the integrity constraints is not activated.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: declared-integrity-constraints
functions.description:
Gets the sequence of QNames representing the integrity constraints that have
 been declared in the prolog of the static context.
functions.summary: Gets the sequence of QNames representing the integrity constraints that have been declared in the prolog of the static context.

returns.description: A sequence of QNames, one for each created integrity constraints, or an emtpy sequence if none.

functions.name: is-activated-integrity-constraint
functions.description: Gets whether an integrity constraints is activated.
functions.summary: Gets whether an integrity constraints is activated.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the constraint to check.

returns.description: true if the integrity constraint is activated; false otherwise.

functions.name: is-declared-integrity-constraint
functions.description:
Gets whether an integrity constraint is declared in the prolog of the static
 context.
functions.summary: Gets whether an integrity constraint is declared in the prolog of the static context.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the constraint to check.

returns.description: true if the constraint is declared; false otherwise.
